title: pixel 4 XL; battery shows question mark , does not charge >50% and drains fast. In India help please
content: Seems like a hardware issue based in threads. Challenge is that I bought the phone in the USA buy now am in India. Anyone in India (Bangalore preferred) who has found a technician/shop to fix this please let me know . Pixel 4xl.
